name: 1inch
description: The 1inch Network unites decentralized protocols whose synergy enables the most lucrative, fastest and protected operations in the DeFi space.

name: Uniswap
description: Uniswap V3 is a noncustodial automated market maker implemented for the Ethereum Virtual Machine. It provides increased capital efficiency, fine-tuned control of liquidity provider, and improve accuracy and convenience of its price oracle.

name: Exactly Protocol
description: Exactly is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform focused on providing fixed-rate lending and borrowing solutions.

name: Stargate
description: Stargate Finance is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform focused on providing cross-chain liquidity transfer solutions.

name: WooFi
description: WOOFi is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform within the WOO Network that offers a variety of financial services including swapping, staking, and yield farming. It aims to provide deep liquidity, low fees, and competitive yields for users

name: Aave
description: Aave is a decentralized finance money market protocol that allows you to lend, borrow, and earn interest on cryptocurrencies.

name: Curve
description: Curve is DeFi’s leading AMM, (Automated Market Maker). Hundreds of liquidity pools have been launched through Curve’s factory and incentivized by Curve’s DAO.

name: Pooltime
description: oolTime is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that offers a gamified staking experience. Users can stake their digital assets to participate in lottery-style reward pools, combining the excitement of gaming with the benefits of DeFi.

name: Sushi
description: A leading multi-chain DEX deployed across 25+ blockchains, cooking up a community-built, open-source ecosystem of all the DeFi tools you need.
